description: A sleek bullpup designed by FN Herstal, complete with an integrated sight accessory rail.  The forward ejecting action and ambidextrous controls make firing comfortable for both left and right-handed shooting.  The whole rifle is well sealed from mud and dust for reliability, but this makes it incompatible with many aftermarket magazines.
//: Forward ejection port would require a different brass catcher design, so there is no slot for it. Bullpup design requires the factory stock to function.
